item.title: RESTful API, Authentication & React study log
item.description: The past two months were the so-called “Klausurphase '' in Germany and I barely updated anything here in those two months. Now it’s time to restart in this new semester. Here is my plan: Learn how to create RESTful API from scratch Learn OAuth 2.0 (perhaps also JWT) Learn REACT basic Dive into React and build (at least one) full-stack React App Other than that I also want to learn more about web3 concepts.
